rule.message: Comments must be no more than 255 characters in length.
rule.name: maxLength

rule.message: Locations must be associated with a coordinate space.
rule.name: required

rule.message: Each location must have an ID
rule.name: required

rule.message: Each location must have a unique ID
rule.name: unique

rule.message: I must be associated with a unit.
rule.name: required

rule.message: J must be associated with a unit.
rule.name: required

rule.message: K must be associated with a unit.
rule.name: required

rule.message: Labels must be no more than 100 characters in length.
rule.name: maxLength

rule.message: Locations must be associated with a Location Type
rule.name: required

rule.message: Locations must be associated with a Location Plan
rule.name: required

rule.message: X must be associated with a Unit
rule.name: required

rule.message: Y must be associated with a unit.
rule.name: required

rule.message: Z must be associated with a unit.
rule.name: required
